item.description:
http://www.meetup.com/Providence-Biking-and-Recreational-Group/events/65603922/

Bike Ride....

Please join our Providence Meetup Group for this event. For information go to the link above.

 

This is a great event and is a fund raiser for a gentleman who is fighting cancer. There is no set donation amount just a jar at the start of the event. You can choose from a 25, 35 or45 mile route around Aquidneck Island. I did this last year and we start down Thames St in Newport with a police escort so we own the road! You get a T-shirt and there is free pizza after. Anyone interested in getting a bite to eat and a beer after can hang out and do so.
item.name: Longest Day Ride in Newport
